oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Two Post Barber Shop ad
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Claiming Space
Business Districts
Advertisements; Barbershops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Advertisement for the Two Post Barber Shop, located on West Vine Street and operated by Fred Malone.
Historically, barbering was a profession that was open to African Americans, even during the antebellum period.
